translation: With the self unattached to external contacts, he finds happiness in the Self; with the self engaged in the meditation of Brahman, he attains endless happiness.
commentary: 5.21 External contacts in external contacts? Asaktatma one whose mind is unattached? finds finds? Atmani in,the Self? Yat (that) which? Happiness happiness? He he? Brahmayogayuktaatma with the self engaged in the meditation of Brahman? Happiness happiness? Inexhaustible endless? Ashnute enjoys.Commentary When the mind is not attached to external objects of the senses? when one is deeply engaged in contemplation
